name: TopSolid'Viewer Document
summary: Learn about .TOPVIW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: TOPVIW files are used for storing drafts of CAD drawings for review and sharing over the Internet. Since TOPVIW files only contain a subset of the design information, they are smaller in size than the original design document. Additionally, this format helps to protect confidential information when sending drafts to external entities.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
